```{r initialize, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
```

Time to import ishares data, they are contained in the same excel sheet

lets get the tickers first

```{r}
ishares <- read_excel("raws/ishares.xls")
ishares
```

isolate them and conver to a mappable list structure

```{r}
names <- ishares %>% 
  select(Name) %>% 
  pull() %>% 
  str_to_lower() %>% 
  str_replace_all(" ", "-")

names[1:3]
```
